content: so your stitches stay on make sure to turn your work so that you are looking at the knit stitches this is your right side you may need to create a space if it s hard to see when you need to be pick up stitches as follows ~place a marker on your needle then pick up diagonal section 16 long flat section 40 diagonal section 16 ~ place a marker on needles then pick up small side 8 ~place a marker on needles then pick up diagonal section 16 long flat section 40 diagonal section 16 place your different marker the one addressed in the things you will need section it can be anything that helps you know this is your beginning of round bor marker having the other markers in place will help you remember where the mesh and plain knit sections are they kinda take some of the brain work from ya 🙂 you should have 160 stitches now on your needles time to work in the round round 1-5 knit around 160 stitches each round/row round 6 yo yarn over ssk slip slip knit repeat these two stitches 35 times knit 8 yo ssk repeat these two stitches 35 times knit 8 160 stitches round 7 knit around 160 stitches round 8 knit around 160 stitches round 9 k2tog knit 2 together yo repeat these two stitches 35 times knit 8 k2tog yo repeat these two stitches 35 times knit 8 160 stitches round 10 knit around 160 stitches round 11 knit around 160 stitches rounds 12-72 repeat rounds 6-11 10 times placing a stitch marker after each repeat is a helpful way to count up how many you have done rounds 73-76 knit around 160 stitches each round cast off 160 stitches attach straps to the mesh sides where they are most comfortable to you by sewing weave in all ends and enjoy your bag you did it
